data.name: Adventurer
data.4-piece_bonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

data.name: Archaic Petra
data.4-piece_bonus: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

data.name: Berserker
data.4-piece_bonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

data.name: Blizzard Strayer
data.4-piece_bonus: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

data.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
data.4-piece_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

data.name: Brave Heart
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

data.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

data.name: Defender's Will
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

data.name: Gambler
data.4-piece_bonus: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

data.name: Gladiator's Finale
data.4-piece_bonus: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

data.name: Heart of Depth
data.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

data.name: Instructor
data.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

data.name: Lavawalker
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

data.name: Lucky Dog
data.4-piece_bonus: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

data.name: Maiden Beloved
data.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

data.name: Martial Artist
data.2-piece_bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
data.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

data.name: Noblesse Oblige
data.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

data.name: Resolution of Sojourner
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

data.name: Retracing Bolide
data.4-piece_bonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

data.name: Scholar
data.4-piece_bonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

data.name: The Exile
data.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

data.name: Thundering Fury
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

data.name: Thundersoother
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

data.name: Tiny Miracle
data.4-piece_bonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

data.name: Traveling Doctor
data.4-piece_bonus: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

data.name: Viridescent Venerer
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

data.name: Wanderer's Troupe
data.4-piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.
